snippet.title: Mirrored Chapter 1 - Opening Scene
snippet.description:
Solve the puzzles and decipher the mysteries in this first chapter of 3D story-based Point&Click Adventure game. 

Here's the first chapter's opening cut-scene of brand new escape room game Mirrored.
